text:
I tried using the 'regexp' library for the first time today. I took the 
following example straight out of the documentation:

<rx:regexp id="rx1">m/test/mi</rx:regexp>

and this caused my jsp page to fail to compile, with the error:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
org/apache/oro/text/regex/MalformedPatternException
creator: george.buttigieg@mediasurface.com
glenn@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug, sounds like the user did not install the jakarta-oro jar
file.  I have updated the regexp taglib documentation to list the jakarta-oro
package dependency.
